MacGregor 26X, 2005

2005 üìç Canyon Lake, Texas
$19,900

The ultimate versatile boat! This MacGregor 26X combines sailing performance with powerboat convenience. With the 50 HP Honda outboard, you can cruise at hull speed even when the wind dies.

Perfect for Texas Lakes

The MacGregor 26X is ideal for Texas lake sailing:

  • Trailerable - Easily move between lakes
  • Water ballast - Light for trailering, stable when sailing
  • Powerful motor - Never get stuck without wind

Recent Upgrades

  • LED lighting throughout (2022)
  • New solar panel and battery system (2022)
  • Full canvas enclosure (2021)
  • Fresh bottom paint (2023)

Specifications

  • LOA: 25'10"
  • Beam: 7'11"
  • Draft (board up): 1'
  • Draft (board down): 5'6"
  • Displacement (water ballast full): 2,550 lbs
  • Sail Area: 350 sq ft

This boat is turnkey and ready for your next adventure. Trailer is in excellent condition with new tires and bearings.

Features & Equipment

  • 50 HP Honda outboard
  • Water ballast system
  • Full cockpit enclosure
  • Bimini with side curtains
  • Shore power
  • Refrigerator
  • Microwave
  • Marine head with holding tank
  • GPS chartplotter
  • VHF radio
  • Stereo system
  • LED lighting upgrade
  • Solar panel
  • Tandem axle trailer

Interested in this boat?

Contact the seller for more information or to schedule a viewing.
